thread.title: LG, Huawei Nexus Smartphones to Be Up for Pre-Order Starting October 13
thread.title_full: LG, Huawei Nexus Smartphones to Be Up for Pre-Order Starting October 13 - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: LG, Huawei Nexus Smartphones to Be Up for Pre-Order Starting October 13
text: Google has been rumored to be working on two Nexus smartphones for some time now, and we expected them to show up at the company’s I/O 2015 conference this summer. Interestingly enough, Google skipped the Nexus topic with grace and focused on other things (like Android M) during its keynote. Well, a few days ago we told you that the search giant scheduled a press event on September 29, during which the »
